column4: I have an album in FLAC. I want to get a list of the title of all songs, how do I do that?
Maybe if you import it into a media player?
Which media player would let me copy the tags of several songs at once? Rhythmbox doesn't seem to be able to do it.
I could do ls and export output to text file but then I won't get special characters that couldn't be in the filename.
